fields.name: Abiliites:
fields.value: - Perform an Investigator (35) check on someone each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All investigative abilities work in reverse. Instead of learning information that's true about a target... whenever someone uses an investigative ability, they choose a result, and then their target changes to fit that result (randomly).
- For example, for your Investigator check, you choose five roles, at least two of which are Town and one of which opposes the Town, and then your target becomes a random one of those roles.
